company.name: International Organization for Migration (IOM) Ukraine, UN Migration Agency

profile_positions.description:
•	Assist the PM and project Assistants in establishing contacts with relevant authorities of Government of Yemen (GOY) and other authorities and agencies as necessary.
•	Assist in the organization of Trainings and workshops and contact the different vendors and participating authorities.
•	Closely follow the latest developments in mixed migration trends in Yemen and in the region as whole; brief the PM and Project Assistants on findings in this field.
•	Arrange meetings of the PM and Project Assistants and other IOM officials as necessary. 
•	Translate written material from Arabic into English and vice-versa, as requested by the PM and Project Assistants and/or his designate.
•	Interpret during formal and informal meetings of the PM and/or his designate and other IOM officials as necessary.
•	Liaise with other IOM staff members including the staff members in Aden.
•	 Assist in project admin/finance /logistics/operations matters and support other operations for the mission.
•	 Attend the policy and legislations task forces, draft progress reports, and liaise with the international consultants.
•	Assist the PM and Project Assistants in preparing progress, interim and final reports for COM, IOM HQ, donors and other reports as necessary. 
•	Develop databases of Trainings, workshops and other events of the projects.
•	Perform such other related duties as maybe assigned by the PM and project assistant and COM.
